languages.text: "Но, боюсь, дело не только в жажде страданий. Гемункул проводил опыты над провидцами с Крудараха в попытке подчинить их силы. Обычно Темные сторонятся любого проявления подобных способностей, обращающих на них взор Той, Что Жаждет. Меня беспокоят эти новости".

traits.locale_text: "Но, боюсь, дело не только в жажде страданий. Гемункул проводил опыты над провидцами с Крудараха в попытке подчинить их силы. Обычно Темные сторонятся любого проявления подобных способностей, способных обратить на них взор Той, Что Жаждет. Меня беспокоят эти новости".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."
languages.original_text: "Но, боюсь, дело не только в жажде страданий. Гемункул проводил опыты над провидцами с Крудараха в попытке подчинить их силы. Обычно Темные сторонятся любого проявления подобных способностей, обращающих на них взор Той, Что Жаждет. Меня беспокоят эти новости".

traits.locale_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculos experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of Her Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculos experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of Her Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Pero me temo que esto no solo obedece a un deseo de causar sufrimiento. El hemónculo experimentó con los videntes de Crudarach en un intento por enjaezar sus poderes. Normalmente los Oscuros evitan toda manifestación de tales aptitudes, pues no desean llamar la atención de la Sedienta. Esto es nuevo, y me preocupa».
languages.original_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: «Pero me temo que esto no solo obedece a un deseo de causar sufrimiento. El hemónculo experimentó con los videntes de Crudarach en un intento por enjaezar sus poderes. Normalmente los Oscuros evitan toda manifestación de tales aptitudes, pues no desean llamar la atención de la Sedienta. Esto es nuevo, y me preocupa».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、苦痛を与える欲望以上の目的があるのかもしれないと、我が心配してるんだ。ハモンキュラスはクルダラの先見司たちに実験を施し、彼らの能力を操ろうとした。通常、かの渇きたる女の注意を引かぬように、暗黒の者たちはそのような能力を明示するのをいかなる時も避けたいものなのだ。我にとって、これは気がかりだ」
languages.original_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、苦痛を与える欲望以上の目的があるのかもしれないと、我が心配してるんだ。ハモンキュラスはクルダラの先見司たちに実験を施し、彼らの能力を操ろうとした。通常、かの渇きたる女の注意を引かぬように、暗黒の者たちはそのような能力を明示するのをいかなる時も避けたいものなのだ。我にとって、これは気がかりだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “但我担心，黑暗子嗣这么做并不仅仅是为了制造痛苦。血伶人用克鲁达拉赫的先知做实验，试图征服他们的力量。通常情况下，黑暗子嗣会避开一切与灵能有关的力量，以免引起饥渴女士的注意，可现在发生的事情却让我深感不安。”
languages.original_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: “但我担心，黑暗子嗣这么做并不仅仅是为了制造痛苦。血伶人用克鲁达拉赫的先知做实验，试图征服他们的力量。通常情况下，黑暗子嗣会避开一切与灵能有关的力量，以免引起饥渴女士的注意，可现在发生的事情却让我深感不安。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mais j'ai peur qu'il ne s'agisse pas simplement d'un désir d'infliger la souffrance. L'hémoncule a mené des expériences sur les Grands Prophètes de Crudarach pour tenter de dompter leurs pouvoirs. En temps normal, les Eldars noirs rejettent toute manifestation de telles capacités, de peur d'attirer l'attention de l'Assoiffée. Cela m'inquiète beaucoup. »
languages.original_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: « Mais j'ai peur qu'il ne s'agisse pas simplement d'un désir d'infliger la souffrance. L'hémoncule a mené des expériences sur les Grands Prophètes de Crudarach pour tenter de dompter leurs pouvoirs. En temps normal, les Eldars noirs rejettent toute manifestation de telles capacités, de peur d'attirer l'attention de l'Assoiffée. Cela m'inquiète beaucoup. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Aber ich fürchte, dahinter steckt noch mehr als der Wunsch, bloßes Leid zuzufügen. Der Haemonculus experimentierte mit den Runenpropheten von Crudarach, um ihre Kräfte zu unterwerfen. Normalerweise meiden die Dunklen jegliche Manifestationen solcher Fähigkeiten, aus Furcht die Aufmerksamkeit von Ihr, die dürstet, zu erregen. Das sind beunruhigende Nachrichten."
languages.original_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich fürchte, dahinter steckt noch mehr als der Wunsch, bloßes Leid zuzufügen. Der Haemonculus experimentierte mit den Runenpropheten von Crudarach, um ihre Kräfte zu unterwerfen. Normalerweise meiden die Dunklen jegliche Manifestationen solcher Fähigkeiten, aus Furcht die Aufmerksamkeit von Ihr, die dürstet, zu erregen. Das sind beunruhigende Nachrichten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Fakat korkarım ki bunların ardında eziyetten çok daha fazlası yatıyor. Haimonkulus, güçlerini buyruğu altına alma teşebbüsüyle Crudarach Ötesezenleri üzerinde deney yapmış. Karalar, normalde Susayan'ın dikkatini çekmesinler diye böylesi kabiliyetlere dair tüm faaliyetlerden uzak durur. Bu durum beni endişelendiriyor."
languages.original_text: "But I fear there is more to it than a desire to inflict suffering. The Haemonculus experimented on the Crudarach Farseers in an attempt to subjugate their powers. Normally, the Dark Ones shun all and any manifestations of such abilities, lest they attract the attention of She Who Thirsts. This is worrying news to me."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat korkarım ki bunların ardında eziyet etmekten çok daha fazlası yatıyor. Haimonkulus, güçlerini buyruğu altına alma teşebbüsüyle Crudarach Ötesezenleri üzerinde deney yapmış. Karalar, normalde Susayan'ın dikkatini çekmesinler diye böylesi kabiliyetlere dair tüm faaliyetlerden uzak dururlar. Bu bilgiler beni endişelendiriyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
